…heroic efforts by U.S.  Capitol Police and other local and Federal law officers who defended us  and our democracy on January 6.

It is not a scary thing. The plaque looks like this.

Don't you agree, Mr. Speaker?

It is lovely. It recognizes their heroic efforts, and it is the law.  It was signed into law by the President that this plaque goes up.

What…

…Capitol Police,  whom I walk past every day. Mr. Speaker, I urge every Member, as they  go past our police officers, not to grumpily look at them, not to pass  by and act like they don't exist, but to take a moment to shake their  hand, tell them thank you, and look them in the eye and tell them how  much you appreciate them.
